plot: Recently relocated from South Dakota with his family, Darren is the new guy in El Paso, Texas. Set in 1993, he soon makes friends and learns about the good, the bad and the ugly of life on the border.
title: Los Gringos
plot_es: Recently relocated from South Dakota with his family, Darren is the new guy in El Paso, Texas. Set in 1993, he soon makes friends and learns about the good, the bad and the ugly of life on the border.
plot_en: Recently relocated from South Dakota with his family, Darren is the new guy in El Paso, Texas. Set in 1993, he soon makes friends and learns about the good, the bad and the ugly of life on the border.
